segments.text: I see a woman focused on drying a plate, completely oblivious to the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing from the sink, creating a small puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the children in the corner of my eye, up to some mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on a stool, clearly reaching for something he shouldn’t.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His limbs are stretched awkwardly, and I can almost hear the wood creaking under him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it won’t just be him who gets hurt; the chaos will engulf everyone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout out, to warn them about the unstable stool, but instead, I just watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
